body_html: I think this PR is important enough (3x faster large tensor copies) to remain tracked until it is merged. By the way why does it take so long in gRPC side? It's literally been over 6 months and it is supposed to be merged into v1.0 initially.
body_text: I think this PR is important enough (3x faster large tensor copies) to remain tracked until it is merged. By the way why does it take so long in gRPC side? It's literally been over 6 months and it is supposed to be merged into v1.0 initially.
body: I think this PR is important enough (3x faster large tensor copies) to remain tracked until it is merged. By the way why does it take so long in gRPC side? It's literally been over 6 months and it is supposed to be merged into v1.0 [initially](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/issues/6116#issuecomment-269716302).
